name: Lithography
description: Sector template for lithography patents including photoresist, exposure, and patterning technologies.
contextDescription: Lithography patents cover the critical patterning step in semiconductor manufacturing. Key areas include photoresist chemistry, exposure systems (DUV, EUV), mask technology, and computational lithography. High-value targets include ASML (sole EUV vendor), photoresist suppliers (JSR, TOK, Shin-Etsu), and foundries. Lithography is the bottleneck for advanced nodes.
scoringGuidance: EUV-related patents are extremely high value given ASML's monopoly.
Photoresist chemistry patents target specialized chemical suppliers.
Computational lithography patents (OPC, ILT) target EDA vendors.
Mask/reticle patents apply to all advanced semiconductor manufacturing.
Multi-patterning patents are essential for nodes below 10nm.

questions.question: What lithography technology does this patent cover? Score: 1-3 for legacy (i-line), 4-6 for DUV/immersion, 7-10 for EUV or next-gen.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify the lithography technology and its relevance to advanced nodes.

questions.question: Does this patent apply to ASML exposure systems? ASML has monopoly on EUV.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Assess relevance to ASML scanner technology.
